text: William Stoney (9 May 1898 - 16 February 1980) was a British swimmer. He competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics and the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1980 deaths Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:People from Pateley Bridge
title: William Stoney
